data.quote: The making of 'Naked' was an absolutely phenomenal, mind-bending experience. That film was life-changing and put my career onto a whole different level.
data.author: David Thewlis

data.quote: The mind when it has an old experience will add that data into its current experience, and it keeps coming up with wrong answers.
data.author: L. Ron Hubbard

data.quote: During the whole 'Jeopardy' experience, I felt like I was living a bit of a double life, I would be secretly flying out to L.A. to tape new shows, hoping that none of my coworkers would notice the absence and figure out what was going on. 'Jeopardy' tries very hard to keep their secrets.
data.author: Ken Jennings
